quote_last: , (shewing his watch) and you are not now in Bath. No theatre, no rooms to prepare for. Half an hour at Northanger must be enough.
title: Northanger Abbey
author: Jane Austen

title: The Wind-up Bird Chronicle

quote_last: For we do not have a high priest who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses, but one who in every respect has been tempted as we are, yet without sin.
title: Hebrews
author: ESV
